definition: SELECT sst.column_one,                                                    sst.column_two,                                                    sst.column_three,                                                    sst.column_four,                                                    sst.column_five,                                                    sst.column_six,                                                    sst.column_seven,                                                    sstt.a_column_one,                                                    sstt.b_column_two,                                                    sstt.c_column_three,                                                    sstt.d_column_four,                                                    sstt.e_column_five,                                                    sstt.f_column_six,                                                    sstt.g_column_seven                                             FROM some_sample_table sst                                                      LEFT JOIN some_sample_table_two sstt                                                                ON sst.id = sstt.some_sample_table_one_id                                             WHERE {filter}                                                   {order}                                                   {offset}                                                   {limit}
